title: 98 The Shocking Truth About Spirituality, Religion and Faith (and why we should care) with Krista Tippett
description:
"The things that go wrong for you have a lot of potential to become part of your gift to the world." - Krista Tippett
For show notes and to learn more about Krista Tippett, visit us at lewishowes.com/98
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
